Rolls.InvalidFocusModifier: The Focus dice modifier (foc, foc<=#) must be applied after a count successes modifier (cs<5) or it will be overwritten!

Heat.Name: Heat
Heat.Hint: Amount of banked Heat available to the GM to spend.

Momentum.Name: Party Momentum
Momentum.Hint: Amount of banked Momentum available to the party to spend.

MaxMomentum.Name: Max Party Momentum
MaxMomentum.Hint: How much Momentum is the party allowed to bank?

ShowHeatToPlayers.Name: Show Heat To Players
ShowHeatToPlayers.Hint: Should the GM's current Heat tracker be showed to players?

AddsQualities.Label: Qualities Added to Weapon
AddsQualities.Hint: When used in a weapon, this ammunition adds these qualities to the weapon's own list of qualities.

Gear.DragQuality: Drag & Drop a Quality item from the item browser to add it to this item!
Gear.QualityAlreadyAddedNotification: This item already has the {name} quality!
Gear.QualitiesOnlyNotification: Only a Quality can be dropped on an Item Sheet!

ReloadCost.Label: Reload Cost
ReloadCost.Hint: Cost of a clip of this ammunition.

Restriction.Label: Restriction
Restriction.Hint: How rare or hard-to-acquire the gear is.

Tariff.Label: Tariff
Tariff.Hint: Each Effect rolled on the cost adds the numerical portion of the Tariff to its cost.

Abbreviation.Label: Abbreviation
Abbreviation.Hint: If an Abbreviation is set, the Quality will be displayed in items with its abbreviation (e.g. 'Comms') instead of full name ('Comms Equipment').

Ranked.Label: Ranked?
Ranked.Hint: Does this quality have a Rank (for example, Concealed 3 is ranked but Disposable is not).

Talent.DragTalent: Drag & drop another talent onto this sheet to set a prerequisite for this talent!
Talent.SameTalentNotification: You cannot set a talent as a prerequisite of itself!
Talent.TalentsOnlyNotification: Only another Talent item can be dropped on a Talent's item sheet as a prerequisite!
